topic.fullpath: Topic :: Formats and Protocols :: Data Formats :: HTML/XHTML

name: Special Characters HTMLizer
short_description:
Especially aimed at German and Turkish special characters, this small tool only offers one JEditorPane for input (left) and output (right) each, and a button. 

When the button is clicked, the contents of the left editor field are processed and delivered to the right editor field.
summary: Automatically converts special characters to their HTML codes.
